recipe.title: Apple Crisp With Streudel Topping
recipe.ingredients: 5- 6 cups apple slices 3/4 cup sugar 1 cup flour 1 tsp baking powder 3/4 tsp salt 1 egg 1/3 cup solid shortening (e.g. Crisco) 1/2 tsp cinnamon
recipe.steps: Preheat the oven to 350L Fill a greased baking dish (approximately 6x10inches) with the apple slices. Mix together the sugar,flour, baking powder, salt and egg until crumbly. Sprinkle over apples. Melt the shortening, cool slightly and pour over apple-flour mixture. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake 30-40 minutes Serving suggestions and notes: Serve with hagen daz Honey Vanilla ice cream for a real treat. You can also add raisins, dried sour cherries or dried blueberries to the apple slices for variety.
